trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Homestead
There were no other sightings in Homestead on or around November 12th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsA friend and i were walking around a local park and after some time we decided to sit on a bench where we noticed the beautiful night sky. As we stared up to the sky we saw a shooting star, as the night progressed i kept an eye out for more shooting stars and once it came time for my friend to leave as i hugged her goodbye i saw what appeared to me to be space debris though im unsure since it was the first time i ever seen anything like it. First falling with a bright white to blue, yellow-orange then red color until no longer visible but a few minutes later as i began to walk home i kept my eyes on the sky staring up as i walked and noticed a star like shine that moved across the sky in a short zig zag sort of motion but kept a steady speed. Faster than the planes i could visibly see and this what i believe to be a UFO was at a far greater altitude than the planes i could see flying above. As i watched this UFO i had a great sense of euphoria wash over me to an extent where i actually shed a tear from an intense sense of happiness and when it just vanished i knew what i saw because planes and stars do not just disappear in the blink of an eye. I hope to one day see it again and experience this moment again.
